resources.string: The Emergency Recorder is running in the background.
An unexpected error occurred attempting to create a new log entry.

An unexpected error occurred attempting to delete this rule.
An unexpected error occurred attempting to update this rule.
Cannot delete this rule, it is protected.
An unexpected error occurred attempting to delete the audit log.
Please grant all the permissions this app requires before launching the bubble camera.
